trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2015 Licensing and Purchase on if already paid for Visual Studio 2013 does user need to pay for Visual Studio 2015.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2015 Licensing and Purchase on if already paid for Visual Studio 2013 does user need to pay for Visual Studio 2015.

trans-unit.source: I already paid for Visual Studio 2013. Do I need to pay for Visual Studio 2015?
trans-unit.target: I already paid for Visual Studio 2013. Do I need to pay for Visual Studio 2015?

trans-unit.source: Yes, Visual Studio 2015 doesn’t install on top of Visual Studio 2013, but is installed alongside Visual Studio 2013.
trans-unit.target: Yes, Visual Studio 2015 doesn’t install on top of Visual Studio 2013, but is installed alongside Visual Studio 2013.

trans-unit.source: But you can try Visual Studio 2015 for free for 30 days, after which your license will expire.
trans-unit.target: But you can try Visual Studio 2015 for free for 30 days, after which your license will expire.

trans-unit.source: Also, you can use Visual Studio 2015 Community for free.
trans-unit.target: Also, you can use Visual Studio 2015 Community for free.

trans-unit.source: Check out the license terms for using Visual Studio Community.
trans-unit.target: Check out the license terms for using Visual Studio Community.
